articles.author: Steven Nelson
articles.title: Biden tells Al Roker 'America is back' during 'surprise' Thanksgiving parade call - New York Post
articles.description: President Biden phoned Al Roker on Thursday to land a cameo in NBC’s coverage of the 2021 Macy’s Thanksgiving Day Parade — repeating his “America is Back” mantra.
articles.content: President Biden phoned Al Roker on Thursday to land a cameo in NBC’s coverage of the 2021 Macy’s Thanksgiving Day Parade repeating his “America is Back” mantra to the weatherman even as inflation and… [+3589 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Lawrence
articles.title: John Madden’s absence from NFL life is never felt more than on Thanksgiving - The Guardian
articles.description: Still America’s sports-broadcasting gold standard more than a decade since called his final NFL game, John Madden’s absence never looms larger than on Thanksgiving
articles.content: For the 19th time since 1934 the Chicago Bears will square off against the Detroit Lions on Thanksgiving in a game that could charitably be dubbed the Tryptophan Bowl. On one side, you have a listles… [+6253 chars]

articles.title: Thanksgiving is a day of mourning for New England's Native American tribes - NPR
articles.description: Thursday's National Day of Mourning in Plymouth, Massachusetts, will honor Indigenous people who've suffered centuries of racism and mistreatment. It's the 52nd year the event has been observed.
articles.content: Supporters of Native Americans pause following a prayer during the 38th National Day of Mourning at Coles Hill in Plymouth, Mass., on Nov. 22, 2007. Denouncing centuries of racism and mistreatment of… [+3255 chars]
